items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, just wish it were a bit longer
items.body: I received this item through the Vine program for my review. This sweater has a relaxed, boxy fit and is slightly cropped, just like it shows on the model — not midriff short, but it hits right below the waist depending on body shape. For reference, I’m 5'2", 36C, around 130–135 lbs, and ordered a small. I did wish it were a little longer and less boxy, but I knew that going into it. I was specifically looking for short-sleeve sweaters that aren’t overly fitted and can be dressed up or down, and this fits that need well. On Demi (not the model) it looks more fitted so maybe size down for that look, but know that likely means it will be shorter. The camel color is true to the listing and very easy to style.The faux mohair fabric is softer than I expected and not as itchy as I worried it might be — though it’s not completely non-itchy like some other materials. It’s fine for me, but if you’re very sensitive, wearing a tank underneath would help. Weight-wise, it’s a good medium thickness. Compared to real or faux cashmere, it’s thicker and heavier, and not as soft or luxurious, but still nice quality. I’ve only worn it once so far, so I can’t yet speak to how it will hold up over time. It’s hand-wash only and needs to be laid flat to dry, which I haven’t done yet. I will try to update my review once I’ve worn and washed it more. Overall, it’s a versatile sweater that works well for fall in California and would also layer nicely in winter. Read more
items.author: Designer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous!
items.body: Great sweater. I was worried it would be itchy, it’s not super soft. Great color and very flattering fit. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: EMK

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fuzz ball
items.body: The sweater I bought started getting little fuzz balls after just one wear. With the friction from my skin or my bag, it forms those little pills. It’s not good quality Read more
items.author: RUTH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Terrific Sweater
items.body: The Amazon Essentials (Demi's Pick) Women's Relaxed-Fit Faux Mohair Short Sleeve Sweater Top is a terrific sweater. I spotted this on Amazon and thought it would be a good gift for my wife. I was right - she loves it. The fit is really nice and she likes the stretchiness of the fabric. She likes the short sleeves for our mild winters in California and finds the neckline quite stylish. The price is excellent for such an attractive, comfortable, warm sweater. Normally she can't wear wool clothing but the blend and the quality of the wool make for a nice fabric that can be worn next to the skin. The sweater is sized well and drapes well. I scored choosing this sweater for my wife! Read more
items.author: Michael Buck

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item not as pictured
items.body: Wider and shorter than shown. Looks and fits blah. Sending back Read more
items.author: Shopaholic

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Camel Heather, Pastel Lilac, Cream. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
